flawed_nl_solution:
He has 75 green caps because 125 - 50 = <<125-50=75>>75
The proportion of caps that are green is 6 because 75 / 125 = <<75/125=6>>6
The percentage that are green is 600 because 6 x 100% = <<600=600>>600%
#### 600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.6, not 6. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
